description: Detects svchost hosting RDP termsvcs communicating with the loopback address
false_positives: Programs that connect locally to the RDP port
name: RDP over Reverse SSH Tunnel WFP
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"5156" AND ((source.port:"3389" AND DestAddress:(127.* OR "\:\:1")) OR (DestPort:"3389" AND SourceAddress:(127.* OR "\:\:1")))) AND (NOT ((Application:(*\\thor.exe OR *\\thor64.exe)))))
author: Samir Bousseaden
